trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract class used for controlling serialization by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示抽象类，用于控制由 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 类执行的序列化。

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for serialization that is derived from the abstract <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化过程，.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构动态生成并编译的临时序列化，它派生自抽象类<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> is also implemented within the .NET Framework for serialization of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects into XML documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> 此外实现在.NET Framework 中的序列化<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>到 XML 文档的对象。

trans-unit.source: You should not derive classes from <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 不应派生的类<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Serialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 而应调用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Serialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of objects that are serialized.
trans-unit.target: 被序列化的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type of objects that are serialized.
trans-unit.target: 被序列化的对象的类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the type of objects that are serialized.
trans-unit.target: 被序列化的对象的类型的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback" /> 委托的实例。

trans-unit.source: Stores an implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback" /> delegate and the type it applies to, for a later invocation.
trans-unit.target: 存储 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback" /> 委托的实现及其应用的类型，以备以后调用。

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 受保护的成员<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>专门用于仅由.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构在内部使用的派生类。

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for serialization that is derived from <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化过程，.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构动态生成并编译的临时序列化，它派生自类<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>。

trans-unit.source: During this process, the .NET Framework generates write methods that implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 在此过程中，.NET Framework 生成写入方法，实现<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>委托。

trans-unit.source: It does so for certain mappings between .NET Framework types and XML data types that are serialized via SOAP-encoded XML and are not root elements.
trans-unit.target: 它会因此对于某些.NET Framework 类型和 XML 数据类型，通过 SOAP 编码的 XML 序列化，并且不是根元素之间的映射。

trans-unit.source: Then, as necessary, a write method is called during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 然后，根据需要，在序列化过程中调用 write 方法。

trans-unit.source: You should not directly create an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>.
trans-unit.target: 不应直接创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>。

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中介绍了 SOAP 编码。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName(System.String)" /> 方法是否用于写入有效的 XML。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.FromXmlQualifiedName(System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName)" /> method returns an encoded name; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.FromXmlQualifiedName(System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName)" /> 方法返回一个编码名称，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A> method writes valid XML from invalid sources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A>方法从无效的源写入有效的 XML。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class can contain spaces, which are invalid as XML.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>类可以包含空格，作为 XML 无效。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.DecodeName%2A> method reads the encoded XML and restores it to the original value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.DecodeName%2A>方法读取编码的 XML 并将其还原到原始值。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Read%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> cannot read such encoded XML.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Read%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>无法读取这类经过编码的 XML。

trans-unit.source: In that case, set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.EscapeName%2A> property to `false` to disable the encoding of the XML.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.EscapeName%2A>属性`false`禁用 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instances of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback" /> delegate to serialize SOAP-encoded XML data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback" /> 委托的一个实例，以序列化 SOAP 编码的 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 受保护的成员<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>专门用于仅由.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构在内部使用的派生类。

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for serialization that is derived from <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化过程，.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构动态生成并编译的临时序列化，它派生自类<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>。

trans-unit.source: During this process, the .NET Framework generates write methods that implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 在此过程中，.NET Framework 生成写入方法，实现<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>委托。

trans-unit.source: It does so for certain mappings between .NET Framework types and XML data types that are serialized using SOAP-encoded XML and are not root elements.
trans-unit.target: 它会因此对于某些.NET Framework 类型和 XML 数据类型，使用 SOAP 编码的 XML 进行序列化，并且不是根元素之间的映射。

trans-unit.source: Then, as necessary, a write method is called during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 然后，根据需要，在序列化过程中调用 write 方法。

trans-unit.source: The abstract <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.InitCallbacks%2A> method is where the temporary derived class creates an instance of and initializes write callback methods.
trans-unit.target: 抽象<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.InitCallbacks%2A>方法是临时的派生的类创建的实例，其中初始化编写回调方法。

trans-unit.source: You should not directly create an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>.
trans-unit.target: 不应直接创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>。

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中介绍了 SOAP 编码。

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding allows a unique XML element to appear once within a SOAP message as a `multiRef` element and to be referenced any number of times by substitute elements.

trans-unit.source: Writes an <see langword="id" /> attribute that appears in a SOAP-encoded <see langword="multiRef" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 写入一个在 SOAP 编码的 <see langword="id" /> 元素中出现的 <see langword="multiRef" /> 特性。

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 受保护的成员<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>专门用于仅由.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构在内部使用的派生类。

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding allows a unique XML element to appear once within a SOAP message as a `multiRef` element identified by an `id` attribute.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 编码允许唯一的 XML 元素作为 SOAP 消息中出现一次`multiRef`标识元素`id`属性。

trans-unit.source: The `id` value can be referenced multiple times by `href` attributes (or `ref` attributes in SOAP 1.2) in substitute elements.
trans-unit.target: `id`值可由引用多次`href`属性 (或`ref`SOAP 1.2 中的属性) 替换元素中。

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中介绍了 SOAP 编码。

trans-unit.target: 写入该命名空间声明特性。

trans-unit.target: 写入一个其主体包含有效 XML 限定名的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> inserts an <see langword="xsi:nil='true'" /> attribute if the string's value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串的值是 <see langword="xsi:nil='true'" />，则 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 插入一个 <see langword="null" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 受保护的成员<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>专门用于仅由.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构在内部使用的派生类。

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, the `nil` attribute from the XML Schema instance namespace (abbreviated `xsi`) indicates a null value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为`true`、`nil`从 XML 架构实例命名空间的属性 (缩写`xsi`) 指示 null 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.WriteNullableQualifiedNameEncoded%2A> method is called only when writing SOAP-encoded XML, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.WriteNullableQualifiedNameEncoded%2A>仅在 SOAP 编码的 XML，编写为 SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中所述时调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the XML element to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的 XML 元素的本地名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the XML element to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的 XML 元素的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The XML qualified name to write in the body of the XML element.
trans-unit.target: 要写入 XML 元素体的 XML 限定名。

trans-unit.source: Writes an XML element whose body contains a valid XML qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 写入一个其主体包含有效 XML 限定名的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> inserts an <see langword="xsi:nil='true'" /> attribute if the string's value is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.target: 受保护的成员<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>专门用于仅由.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构在内部使用的派生类。

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, the `nil` attribute from the XML Schema instance namespace (abbreviated `xsi`) indicates a null value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为`true`、`nil`从 XML 架构实例命名空间的属性 (缩写`xsi`) 指示 null 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.WriteNullableQualifiedNameLiteral%2A> method is called only when writing literal XML that can be defined in an XML Schema document.

trans-unit.target: 要写入 <see langword="xsi:type" /> 特性的“XML 架构”数据类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Writes an XML element that contains a string as the body.
trans-unit.target: 写入一个 XML 元素，该元素包含一个作为主体的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> inserts an <see langword="xsi:nil='true'" /> attribute if the string's value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串的值是 <see langword="xsi:nil='true'" />，则 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 插入一个 <see langword="null" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, the `nil` attribute from the XML Schema instance namespace (abbreviated `xsi`) indicates a null value.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.WriteNullableStringEncoded%2A> method is called only when writing SOAP-encoded XML, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding allows a unique XML element to appear once within a SOAP message as a `<multiRef>` element identified by an `id` attribute.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 编码允许唯一的 XML 元素作为 SOAP 消息中出现一次`<multiRef>`标识元素`id`属性。

trans-unit.source: The `id` value can be referenced multiple times using `href` attributes (or `ref` attributes in SOAP 1.2) in substitute elements.
trans-unit.target: `id`值可以是引用的多次使用`href`属性 (或`ref`SOAP 1.2 中的属性) 替换元素中。

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中介绍了 SOAP 编码。

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 受保护的成员<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>专门用于仅由.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构在内部使用的派生类。

trans-unit.source: The local name of an XML Schema data type.
trans-unit.target: XML 架构数据类型的本地名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of an XML Schema data type.
trans-unit.target: XML 架构数据类型的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Writes an <see langword="xsi:type" /> attribute for an XML element that is being serialized into a document.
trans-unit.target: 为要序列化为文档的 XML 元素写入一个 <see langword="xsi:type" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 受保护的成员<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>专门用于仅由.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构在内部使用的派生类。

trans-unit.source: The `xsi:type` attribute explicitly indicates the XML Schema data type.
trans-unit.target: `xsi:type`属性显式指示 XML 架构数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The prefix `xsi` refers to the XML Schema instance namespace.
trans-unit.target: 前缀`xsi`指的是 XML 架构实例命名空间。
